title: House passes Trump's 'big, beautiful bill'
shortDescription: The House passed President Donald Trump's 'big, beautiful bill.' It will now move onto the Senate.

title: Medicaid, SNAP, tax breaks: See what exactly is in Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: But the tax cut package that passed the U.S. House and President Trump has dubbed the "big, beautiful bill" may change before it becomes law.

title: Which 5 House Republicans didn't vote for Trump's sweeping tax bill?
shortDescription: GOP Reps. Thomas Massie of Kentucky and Warren Davidson of Ohio opposed Trump's bill. Andy Harris of Maryland voted present. Two more didn't vote.

title: Trump's deficit-swelling tax bill passes House
shortDescription: The House proposal would enact Trump's major campaign promises while dramatically changing Medicaid, food benefits, income taxes and border security.

title: Trump's National Park Service to get biggest test yet: Memorial Day
shortDescription: Public lands advocates worry visitors will get a misleading picture of parks and forests as staff scramble to keep up.

title: Oklahoma will teach high schoolers 'Big Lie' about 2020 election
shortDescription: The Republican-led state's new high school history curriculum says students must learn about Donald Trump's baseless claims of voting irregularities.

title: Trump tax bill back on track? GOP leadership unveils awaited updates
shortDescription: House Republicans plan to tee up the legislation for a vote as soon as possible.

title: House speaker confident on Trump tax bill but vote still uncertain
shortDescription: Speaker Mike Johnson has insisted that President Donald Trump's tax and spending bill should be passed before Memorial Day.

title: Trump targets South African leader in latest Oval Office ambush
shortDescription: President Trump confronted South African President Cyril Ramaphosa with false claims of genocide during a wild and heated Oval Office meeting.

title: Trump claims 'White genocide' at White House
shortDescription: Donald Trump falsely accused South African President Cyril Ramaphosa of overseeing "genocide" against White people during a White House meeting.

title: No, Trump didn't cancel Pride Month. Deepfake video goes viral
shortDescription: A deepfake video with crude comments of Trump canceling Pride Month went viral. While it is fake, his administration has targeted the trans community.

title: South African leader teases Trump about jet: 'Sorry we don’t have a plane to give you.'
shortDescription: South African President Cyril Ramaphosa broke up stern trade talks at the White House with a joke about wishing he had a gift for the president.

title: Trump admin. violated court order by removing migrants to South Sudan
shortDescription: The planeload of men, all convicted of serious crimes, was stopped en route to the war-torn African nation

title: Who benefits in Trump's big tax bill?
shortDescription: The nations richest Americans will see benefits from the Trump administration's "Big, Beautiful Bill," while the poorest will be left behind.

title: Pentagon accepts Qatar's $400 million jet for President Donald Trump
shortDescription: Democrats are calling for an investigation of the unprecedented gift, which will require extensive renovation to serve as a flying White House.

title: Trump reveals plans for ‘Golden Dome’ missile defense system
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has unveiled plans for a “Golden Dome” missile defense system, modeled after Israel’s Iron Dome, aiming to complete it by the end of his term.

title: Report: GOP tax bill would decrease resources for poorest Americans
shortDescription: The analysis comes as lawmakers seek to pass the sweeping legislation ahead of Memorial Day.

title: Trump's tax and policy bill stalls as conservatives push for changes
shortDescription: President Trump told reporters Republicans are "very close" to a deal as House Speaker Mike Johnson and Freedom Caucus members continue negotiations.
